title: User Authentication Flow with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully sign up, log in, and manage their profile using the Supabase authentication system.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page.
Input valid email and password then submit the signup form.
Verify the user account is created and user is redirected to the dashboard.
Log out, navigate to login page, input previously registered credentials and submit.
Verify successful login and access to user profile.
Edit profile information and save changes.
Confirm profile details are updated correctly.

title: User Authentication Flow with Invalid Credentials
description: Check system response to login attempts with incorrect or incomplete credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter invalid email format and submit login.
Verify an appropriate validation error message is shown for invalid email.
Enter valid email but incorrect password and submit.
Verify login is denied with a failure message.
Attempt to submit empty login form.
Verify validation errors are displayed for missing fields.

title: Subscription Plan Restrictions Enforcement
description: Ensure users only access features and integrations allowed by their active subscription plan.

steps.description: Log in with a user on the Free plan.
Verify only Free plan features are enabled and others are disabled or hidden.
Attempt to access premium financial export features (CSV/PDF).
Verify access is denied with a prompt to upgrade.
Upgrade user to Business plan.
Verify newly unlocked features are now accessible including support system and Google Workspace integration.

title: Financial Operations Recording and Export
description: Validate the ability to add financial entries and exits, categorize them, filter them, and export reports correctly according to user plan.

steps.description: Log in with a paid subscription (Business or Premium).
Navigate to financial records page.
Add a new financial entry with valid values and category.
Verify the new record appears correctly in the list with proper categorization.
Filter financial records by date range and category.
Verify filtered results correspond to selected parameters.
Export the financial report as CSV.
Verify the exported CSV file contains correct and complete records.
Export the financial report as PDF.
Verify the exported PDF is well formatted and contains correct data.

title: AI Agent Interaction via WhatsApp
description: Verify AI-powered sub-agents correctly interpret and respond to natural language commands sent through WhatsApp in compliance with WhatsApp Business rules and LGPD.

steps.description: Send a lead qualification request to the SDR AI agent via WhatsApp.
Verify the agent responds with a correct and relevant message qualifying the lead.
Send a scheduling request to the Scheduling agent asking to book a meeting syncing with Google Calendar.
Verify the meeting is created in the user's Google Calendar and confirmation is sent via WhatsApp.
Send a marketing analysis query to the Marketing agent.
Verify the agent returns accurate Google Ads insights.
Send opt-out command to AI agents via WhatsApp.
Verify user is opted out per LGPD and no further messages are sent.

title: Support System Functionality and Priority Handling
description: Validate support ticket submission, FAQ access, live chat functionality and priority support response for eligible plans.

steps.description: Log in as Business plan user.
Submit a new support ticket describing a technical issue.
Verify ticket is accepted and visible in support dashboard.
Access FAQ section and perform a search for common issues.
Verify relevant FAQ articles are displayed.
Initiate live chat with support.
Verify chat support is available and responds within SLAs.
Log in as Free plan user and attempt live chat.
Verify live chat is not available or access is restricted.

title: Automated Backup and Data Restoration Process
description: Test that automated backups follow the 3-2-1 policy and can be restored successfully in Premium plans.

steps.description: Log in as Premium plan user.
Trigger manual backup via backup dashboard.
Verify backup file is created and off-site storage confirms receipt.
Simulate data loss and perform restoration using the backup.
Verify all user data is restored accurately and application functions as expected.

title: Governance and Data Privacy Compliance
description: Ensure data retention policies are enforced, and opt-in/opt-out user preferences conform to LGPD requirements.

steps.description: Log in and review user privacy settings.
Opt-out of data sharing and AI agent messaging.
Verify that no further AI agent messages are sent and data sharing stops.
Request data export for governance review.
Verify data export complies with retention and user preferences.
Check data deletion requests are processed correctly within legal timeframes.
Verify data is deleted and no longer accessible after retention period.

title: UI Responsiveness and Accessibility
description: Validate that the user interface is responsive across devices and adheres to accessibility standards.

steps.description: Open the web application on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Verify layout adjusts properly for each screen size without breaking elements.
Use screen reader to navigate key pages such as Dashboard, Financial Management, and Scheduling.
Verify all interactive elements are announced correctly and navigable via keyboard.
Switch between light and dark theme modes.
Verify theme changes are applied consistently across all UI elements.

title: Third-Party Integration with Google Workspace via OAuth
description: Verify secure OAuth authorization flow with minimum scopes and functional integration for scheduling and file management.

steps.description: Initiate Google Workspace calendar integration.
Authenticate via OAuth with requested scopes limited to calendar, drive, tasks, and Gmail as needed.
Verify authentication succeeds and access is granted only to the requested scopes.
Create, update, and delete calendar events using Scheduling sub-agent.
Verify changes are reflected correctly in Google Calendar.
Access Google Drive files and tasks via the agent within permissions.
Verify data is accessible and updated as per requested user actions.

title: Web Search and Web Scraping Agent Compliance
description: Ensure Web Search and Scrape agents use permitted APIs and open data sources only and do not violate terms of use.

steps.description: Execute a data extraction command through Web Search agent targeting supported data sources.
Verify agent only queries allowed APIs and returns accurate data.
Attempt to scrape data from a forbidden source.
Verify agent denies the action and logs the incident appropriately.

title: Notification Preferences and Alerts Configuration
description: Test that users can configure notification settings and receive alerts and reminders as expected.

steps.description: Navigate to notification settings in user profile.
Enable or disable various notification types such as email alerts, in-app notifications, and WhatsApp messages.
Verify changes are saved and respected by the system.
Trigger events that produce notifications (e.g., upcoming bill, support ticket update).
Verify the user receives only the enabled types of notifications.
